text: The Gaylord Herald Times is the twice-weekly newspaper of Gaylord, Michigan, United States. == History == The Gaylord Herald Times was founded in 1875. The paper started publishing twice weekly in May 1999. In 2006, it was purchased by Schurz Communications purchased the paper along with its sister publications, the Petoskey News-Review and the Charlevoix Courier in 2006. It was sold again to GateHouse Media in 2019. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Newspapers published in Michigan Category:Otsego County, Michigan Category:Publications established in 1878 Category:Gannett publications
title: Gaylord Herald Times
